attributes.action: Sack Boris Johnson due to his lack of response to current situation with COVID19
attributes.additional_details: People are not informed properly, government and Mr Johnson didn’t take actions in regards to mass events, everything is a mess, people panicking and buying extra which is leaving others with nothing. The government should take actions ASAP, as the virus is spreading and there are more deaths every day.
attributes.background: Sack Boris Johnson as his response to the current situation with COVID-19 is very poor, locking down 70 years old in house for 4 months won’t solve the problem. His actions are poor and not enough. People as scared looking at what other countries are doing to prevent the virus spreading.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
